Identification_Area.title: POLARIMETRY OF TRANSNEPTUNIAN OBJECTS AND CENTAURS V2.0

Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

External_Reference.reference_text: Avramchuk V.V., V.Iu. Rakhimov, G.P. Chernova, and V.I. Shavlovskii, Photometry and polarimetry of Pluto near its perihelion. Kinemat. Phys. Neb. Tel, v. 8, No. 4, p. 37-45 (in Russian), 1992.

Bagnulo S., H. Boehnhardt, K. Muinonen, L. Kolokolova, I. Belskaya, and M.A. Barucci, Exploring the surface properties of transneptunian objects and Centaurs with polarimetric FORS1/VLT observations, Astron. Astroph., v. 450, No. 3, p. 1239-1248, 2006.

Bagnulo S., I. Belskaya, K. Muinonen, G.P. Tozzi, M.A. Barucci, L. Kolokolova, and S. Fornasier, Discovery of two distinct polarimetric behaviours of trans-Neptunian objects, Astron. Astrophys 491, L33-L36, 2008.
Belskaya I., S. Bagnulo, K. Muinonen, M.A. Barucci, G.P. Tozzi, S. Fornasier, and L. Kolokolova, Polarimetry of the dwarf planet (136199) Eris, Astron. Astroph., v. 479, No. 1, p. 265-269, 2008.

Belskaya, I.N., S. Bagnulo, M.A. Barucci, K. Muinonen, G.P. Tozzi, S. Fornasier, and L. Kolokolova, Polarimetry of Centaurs (2060) Chiron, (5145) Pholus and (10199) Chariklo, Icarus, 210, 472-479, 2010.
Boehnhardt H., S. Bagnulo, K. Muinonen, M.A. Barucci, L. Kolokolova, E. Dotto, and G.P. Tozzi G.P., Surface characterization of 28978 Ixion (2001 KX76), Astron. Astrophys. 415, L21-25, 2004.
Breger M. and W.D. Cochran, Polarimetry of Pluto, Icarus, v. 49, p. 120-124, 1982.
Kelsey J.D. and L.A. Fix, Polarimetry of Pluto, Astrophys. J., v. 184, p. 633-636, 1973.

Rousselot P., A.C. Levasseur-Regourd, K. Muinonen, and J.-M. Petit, Polarimetric and Photometric Phase Effects Observed on Transneptunian Object (29981) 1999 TD10, Earth, Moon and Planets, v. 97, No. 3-4, p. 353-364, 2005.

Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_name: POLARIMETRY OF TRANSNEPTUNIAN OBJECTS AND CENTAURS V2.0
Data_Set_PDS3.citation_text: Belskaya, I.N., Ed., Polarimetry of Transneptunian Objects and Centaurs V2.0. EAR-A-COMPIL-3-TNO-CEN-POLARIM-V2.0. NASA Planetary Data System, 2011.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Polarimetry of TNOs and Centaurs published by February 8, 2011.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: The dataset contains a summary of polarimetric observations of Transneptunian objects (including Pluto-Charon system) and Centaurs published by February 8, 2011.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= The dataset includes available data on imaging polarimetry of the Centaurs 2060 Chiron, 5154 Pholus, and 10199 Chariklo, TNOs 20000 Varuna, 26375 (1999 DE9), 28978 Ixion, 29981 (1999 TD10), 50000 Quaoar and the dwarf planet 136199 Eris obtained with the VLT and published by Boehnhardt et al. (2004), Rousselot et al. (2005), Bagnulo et al. (2006, 2008), and Belskaya et al. (2008, 2010). The results of polarimetric observations of the Pluto-Charon system were also included. Pluto's polarimetric observations were made in 1972-1988 and published by Kelsey and Fix (1973), Breger and Cochran (1982) and Avramchuk et al. (1992).
References ==========
Boehnhardt H., Bagnulo S., Muinonen K., Barucci M.A., Kolokolova L., Dotto E., Tozzi G.P. 2004. Surface characterization of 28978 Ixion (2001 KX76). Astron. Astrophys. 415, L21-25.
Rousselot P., Levasseur-Regourd, A.C., Muinonen K., Petit J.-M. 2005. Polarimetric and Photometric Phase Effects Observed on Transneptunian Object (29981) 1999 TD10. Earth, Moon and Planets, v. 97, No. 3-4, p. 353-364.
Bagnulo S., Boehnhardt H., Muinonen K., Kolokolova L., Belskaya I., Barucci M.A. 2006. Exploring the surface properties of transneptunian objects and Centaurs with polarimetric FORS1/VLT observations. Astron. Astroph., v. 450, No. 3, p. 1239-1248.
Belskaya I., Bagnulo S., Muinonen K., Barucci M.A., Tozzi G.P., Fornasier S., Kolokolova L. 2008. Polarimetry of the dwarf planet (136199) Eris. Astron. Astroph., v. 479, No. 1, p. 265-269.
Kelsey J.D., Fix L.A. 1973. Polarimetry of Pluto. Astrophys. J., v. 184, p. 633-636.
Breger M., Cochran W.D. 1982. Polarimetry of Pluto. Icarus, v. 49, p. 120-124.
Avramchuk V.V., Rakhimov V.Iu., Chernova G.P., Shavlovskii V.I. 1992. Photometry and polarimetry of Pluto near its perihelion. Kinemat. Phys. Neb. Tel, v. 8, No. 4, p. 37-45 (Russian).
Bagnulo S., Belskaya I., Muinonen K., Tozzi G.P., Barucci M.A., Kolokolova L., Fornasier S. Discovery of two distinct polarimetric behaviours of trans-Neptunian objects. Astron. Astrophys 491, L33-L36, 2008.
Belskaya, I.N., Bagnulo, S., Barucci, M.A., Muinonen, K., Tozzi, G.P., Fornasier, S., Kolokolova, L. Polarimetry of Centaurs (2060) Chiron, (5145) Pholus and (10199) Chariklo. Icarus, 210, 472-479, 2010.
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Confidence Level Overview ========================= This data set is intended to represent a complete survey of the literature of TNO and Centaur polarimetry. Details of the confidence level of the individual measurements can be found in the published papers referenced for each entry.
Observations of 29981 (1999 TD10) were published by Rousselot et al. (2005) as the mean of two consecutive nights.
